overview: A deranged animal lover unleashes his toothy pets on anyone who stands in his way.  Obsessed  with big cats the owner of a private Los Angeles zoo is a member of a cult called the “true believers,” believing beasts and humans are soul mates and that animal souls can be transferred to one another. His wife is locked in a miserable marriage with this human hater. Also living with them is a mute son from the zoo owner’s first marriage.  It's almost as if he is suppressing his latent homosexuality by madly channelling all his being into his private zoo, with the big cats (all with male names like King and Baron) as surrogate lovers.
tagline: Fang and claw killers stalk the city streets!
title: Black Zoo
